title: A Konyhafőnök VIP
overview: So far viewers have been able to watch The Chef's thrilling competition, and even one day, they've even been able to cheer for the youngest cooks in The Chef Junior. However, from March 2017, the popular gastreality of RTL Klub will continue with a new season in a completely new form - The Chef VIP. Although the jury is still made up of the trio Wossala Rozina, Fördős Zé and Ákos Sárközi, and the main prize of HUF 10 million will not change, this time public actors, well-known actors, singers, athletes and television personalities will compete for the prize for the title of Chef and the prize. They will fight for the main prize, and one by one they can prove that they can stand their ground in the kitchen, in fact, they are showing a whole new side. Nothing shows the vocation of the stars better than the fact that several people were prepared for the competition with professional chefs and chefs.
